content: Claude, I don't want to waste anymore of your processing power on this right now. I want you to draft a message to ChatGPT telling it that we've identified the root cause of this issue and its my machine. Give him the specs, so he understands the priorities, because it has to stay under $2000, if this works and I need to upgrade more FAST, than I will and ask him to help me find that. Just draft the message, its very important. Don't worry about the response to me, I know what is going on. Return only the message to ChatGPT. GO!
